fileSamples.statement: (m ↑₁ E_t ∪₁ eq a) \₁ eq a ≡₁ m ↑₁ E_t.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite set_minus_union_l.
rewrite set_minusK.
rewrite set_union_empty_r.
apply set_minus_disjoint; eauto.

fileSamples.statement: m ↑₁ E_t \₁ eq a ∪₁ eq a \₁ eq a ≡₁ m ↑₁ E_t.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite set_minusK.
rewrite set_union_empty_r.
apply set_minus_disjoint; eauto.

fileSamples.statement: m ↑₁ E_t \₁ eq a ∪₁ ∅ ≡₁ m ↑₁ E_t.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite set_union_empty_r.
apply set_minus_disjoint; eauto.

fileSamples.statement: m ↑₁ E_t \₁ eq a ≡₁ m ↑₁ E_t.
fileSamples.proofString: apply set_minus_disjoint; eauto.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ ⦗(F_s ∪₁ W_s) ∩₁ Rel_s⦘ ⨾ sw_s ⨾ ⦗(F_s ∪₁ R_s) ∩₁ Acq_s⦘ ⊆ ∅₂.
fileSamples.proofString:
seq_rewrite <- id_inter.
clear - IS_NREL.
basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗eq a ∩₁ ((F_s ∪₁ W_s) ∩₁ Rel_s)⦘ ⨾ sw_s ⨾ ⦗(F_s ∪₁ R_s) ∩₁ Acq_s⦘ ⊆ ∅₂.
fileSamples.proofString:

basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗eq a ∩₁ ((F_s ∪₁ W_s) ∩₁ Rel_s)⦘ ⨾ sw_s ⨾ ⦗(F_s ∪₁ R_s) ∩₁ Acq_s⦘ ⊆ ∅₂.
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement: rf_s ⨾ m ↑ rmw_t ⊆ m ↑ (rf_t ⨾ rmw_t).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_rmwE WF_t) at 1.
rewrite !collect_rel_seqi.
rewrite collect_rel_eqv, <- acts_set_helper.
sin_rewrite RF_MAP.
rewrite collect_rel_seq; [basic_solver 11 |].
rewrite (wf_rfE WF_t), (wf_rmwE WF_t).
eapply inj_dom_mori; eauto.
unfold flip.
clear.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: rf_s ⨾ m ↑ (⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ rmw_t ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘) ⊆ m ↑ (rf_t ⨾ rmw_t).

rewrite (wf_rfE WF_t), (wf_rmwE WF_t).
eapply inj_dom_mori; eauto.
unfold flip.
clear.
basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: rf_s ⨾ m ↑ ⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ m ↑ rmw_t ⨾ m ↑ ⦗E_t⦘ ⊆ m ↑ (rf_t ⨾ rmw_t).

rewrite collect_rel_seq; [basic_solver 11 |].
rewrite (wf_rfE WF_t), (wf_rmwE WF_t).

basic_solver.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ rpo_s ∪ ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ sw_s ⊆ ∅₂.
fileSamples.proofString:
sin_rewrite read_codom_sw.
sin_rewrite CODOM_RPO.
sin_rewrite CODOM_SB_SL.
now rewrite !union_false_r.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ rpo_s ∪ ∅₂ ⊆ ∅₂.

sin_rewrite CODOM_SB_SL.
now rewrite !union_false_r.

fileSamples.statement:
(sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘
⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
remember (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) as rhbimm.
arewrite (rhbimm ⊆ ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘).
subst rhbimm.
arewrite (      sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ⊆        ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s) ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘    ).
rewrite wf_sbE at 1.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_lr.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_ll.
reflexivity.
rewrite wf_rpoE, (wf_swE WF_s) at 1.
clear.
basic_solver 11.
arewrite (⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘).
rewrite set_union_minus     with (s := E_s) (s' := eq a)       at 1; [| rewrite E_MAP; basic_solver].
rewrite id_union, !seq_union_l.
arewrite_false (⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ rhbimm).
subst rhbimm.
apply read_rhb_imm_codom.
now rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.

fileSamples.statement: (rhbimm : actid -> actid -> Prop) (Heqrhbimm : rhbimm = sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) : rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite (rhbimm ⊆ ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘).
subst rhbimm.
arewrite (      sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ⊆        ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s) ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘    ).
rewrite wf_sbE at 1.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_lr.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_ll.
reflexivity.
rewrite wf_rpoE, (wf_swE WF_s) at 1.
clear.
basic_solver 11.
arewrite (⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘).
rewrite set_union_minus     with (s := E_s) (s' := eq a)       at 1; [| rewrite E_MAP; basic_solver].
rewrite id_union, !seq_union_l.
arewrite_false (⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ rhbimm).
subst rhbimm.
apply read_rhb_imm_codom.
now rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.

fileSamples.statement: (rhbimm : actid -> actid -> Prop) (Heqrhbimm : rhbimm = sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) : rhbimm ⊆ ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
subst rhbimm.

rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_ll.

sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s

∪ ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ sw_s ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘ ⊆ ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘.

fileSamples.statement:
(rhbimm : actid -> actid -> Prop) (Heqrhbimm : rhbimm = sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) : ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘

rewrite id_union, !seq_union_l.
arewrite_false (⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ rhbimm).
subst rhbimm.
apply read_rhb_imm_codom.
now rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.

fileSamples.statement:

⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhbimm ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.

fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite ct_begin.
sin_rewrite read_rhb_imm_codom.
now rewrite seq_false_l.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗eq a⦘
⨾ (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) ⨾ (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s)＊
⊆ ∅₂.

now rewrite seq_false_l.

fileSamples.statement: rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_rhbE WF_s) at 1.
rewrite set_union_minus     with (s := E_s) (s' := eq a)       at 1; [| rewrite E_MAP; basic_solver].
rewrite id_union, seq_union_l.
sin_rewrite read_rhb_codom.
rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.
basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗E_s⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘) ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘
⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:

rewrite id_union, seq_union_l.
sin_rewrite read_rhb_codom.
rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.
basic_solver 11.

(⦗E_s \₁ eq a ∪₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘) ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘
⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:

rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.
basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘ ∪ ⦗eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘) ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘
⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:

rewrite seq_false_l, union_false_r.

fileSamples.statement:

⊆ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘ ⨾ rhb_s ⨾ ⦗E_s⦘) ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘

fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement: restr_rel (E_s \₁ eq a) rhb_s ⊆ m ↑ rhb_t.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold rhb.
assert (UP : upward_closed    (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s)    (E_s \₁ eq a)  ).
unfold upward_closed.
intros x y HREL YIN.
assert (HREL' :      ((sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s)        ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘) x y    ).
exists y.
split; auto.
red.
auto.
apply read_rhb_imm_start in HREL'.
forward apply HREL'.
clear.
basic_solver.
rewrite restr_rel_ct; auto.
arewrite (    sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t ≡      restr_rel E_t (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t)  ).
rewrite restr_relE.
apply dom_helper_3.
arewrite (      sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ⊆        ⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t) ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘    ).
rewrite wf_sbE at 1.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_lr.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_ll.
reflexivity.
rewrite wf_rpoE, (wf_swE WF_t).
clear.
basic_solver 11.
rewrite collect_rel_ct_inj; [| exact INJ].
apply clos_trans_mori.
arewrite (    restr_rel (E_s \₁ eq a)      (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) ⊆        m ↑ (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t)  ).
rewrite !collect_rel_union, !restr_union.
rewrite !restr_relE.
sin_rewrite RPO_MAP.
sin_rewrite SB_SL_MAP.
sin_rewrite read_sw_sub_helper.
rewrite acts_set_helper.
clear.
basic_solver 11.
rewrite wf_sbE at 1.
rewrite wf_rpoE at 1.
rewrite (wf_swE WF_t) at 1.
clear.
basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement:
restr_rel (E_s \₁ eq a) (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s)⁺
⊆ m ↑ (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t)⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
assert (UP : upward_closed    (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s)    (E_s \₁ eq a)  ).
unfold upward_closed.
intros x y HREL YIN.
assert (HREL' :      ((sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s)        ⨾ ⦗E_s \₁ eq a⦘) x y    ).
exists y.
split; auto.
red.
auto.
apply read_rhb_imm_start in HREL'.
forward apply HREL'.
clear.
basic_solver.
rewrite restr_rel_ct; auto.
arewrite (    sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t ≡      restr_rel E_t (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t)  ).
rewrite restr_relE.
apply dom_helper_3.
arewrite (      sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ⊆        ⦗E_t⦘ ⨾ (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t) ⨾ ⦗E_t⦘    ).
rewrite wf_sbE at 1.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_lr.
rewrite <- seq_eqv_inter_ll.
reflexivity.
rewrite wf_rpoE, (wf_swE WF_t).
clear.
basic_solver 11.
rewrite collect_rel_ct_inj; [| exact INJ].
apply clos_trans_mori.
arewrite (    restr_rel (E_s \₁ eq a)      (sb_s ∩ same_loc_s ∪ rpo_s ∪ sw_s) ⊆        m ↑ (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t)  ).
rewrite !collect_rel_union, !restr_union.
rewrite !restr_relE.
sin_rewrite RPO_MAP.
sin_rewrite SB_SL_MAP.
sin_rewrite read_sw_sub_helper.
rewrite acts_set_helper.
clear.
basic_solver 11.
rewrite wf_sbE at 1.
rewrite wf_rpoE at 1.
rewrite (wf_swE WF_t) at 1.
clear.
basic_solver 11.

⊆ m ↑ (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t) ∪ m ↑ rpo_t ∪ m ↑ sw_t.
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver 11.

fileSamples.statement:

⊆ m ↑ restr_rel E_t (sb_t ∩ same_loc_t ∪ rpo_t ∪ sw_t).
